DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research provide valuable traditional chinese medicine theory formula treat Primary Ovarian insufficiency .
DOC.brief_title: Chinese Medicine ( Hu Yang Yang Kun Formula ) Primary Ovarian Insufficiency
DOC.detailed_description: Primary ovarian insufficiency problem solve urgently field reproductive endocrine . According basic theory traditional Chinese Medicine clinical experience , investigator develop Chinese medicine formula ( Hu yang yang kun , Hyyk ) . This research design accord principle randomize double blind control evaluate effectiveness safety Hyyk , hope provide kind effective medicine treat primary ovarian insufficiency .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 1840 2 . Menstrual cycle change 7 day least 2 time , amenorrhea less 6 month . 3 . Sex hormone : bFSH > 10u/L ; E2 > 80pg/ml . 4 . AMH < 1ng/ml . 5 . Informed consent truthfully answer question . 1 . Dose meet inclusion criterion . 2 . Genital tract malformation , congenital germinal aplasia , uterine amenorrhea organic disease . 3 . Endocrine diseases Polycystic ovary syndrome、hyperprolactinemia 、dysfunctional uterine bleeding、low gonadotropin menstrual disorder hyperthyreosis 4 . Autoimmune disease patient : Hashimoto 's thyroiditis , SLE , Primary chronic adrenal cortical insufficiency , Asthenic bulbar paralysis , Arthritis deformans , Idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura , type I diabetes . 5 . Someone follow gynecological operation history : oophorocystectomy , ovarian drilling , wedgeshaped oophorectomy , adnexectomy , tubal resection , ligation oviduct , pelvic abscess surgery , uterine arterial embolization . 6 . Someone use reproductive toxicity drug : tripterygium wilfordii , tripterygium hypoglaucum hutch , chemotherapeutics . 7 . A family history ovarian failure . 8 . Have receive hormone therapy recent 3 month . 9 . Pregnant lactating woman . 10. serious heart , liver kidney disease 11 . With severe psychiatric disorder . 12 . Have participate clinical trial 3 month .
